bibl.title: The Ptolemaic Base at Koressos on Keos.
bibl.note: Considers the impact, in terms of material culture, of incorporation into the Ptolemaic Empire on an Aegean city-state, namely Koressos (or Koresia). - The Historical and Epigraphical Sources. - The Archaeological Evidence (Coinage. Koressos and its Territory. The polis Centre).
bibl.seg: CHERRY John F. and Jack L. DAVIS, The Ptolemaic Base at Koressos on Keos.

Considers the impact, in terms of material culture, of incorporation into the Ptolemaic Empire on an Aegean city-state, namely Koressos (or Koresia). - The Historical and Epigraphical Sources. - The Archaeological Evidence (Coinage. Koressos and its Territory. The polis Centre).
